description:
gotour: Replace a hardcoding string with a template mark.

Replace the hardcoding string ``A Tour of Go''
with a template mark ``{{.Title}}''.
It will take a better user experience to the other language.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-tour/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go-tour/source/detail?r=d359c6b8e4c2 ***

gotour: Replace a hardcoding string with a template mark.

Replace the hardcoding string ``A Tour of Go''
with a template mark ``{{.Title}}''.
It will take a better user experience to the other language.

CC=golang-dev
